item.description:
Join us on Wednesday, August 22nd for a summer potluck feast!

Our goal is to unite food, farming, and gardening enthusiasts under one roof to build community and share tips on urban gardening and homesteading ideas.

This will mark the Northeast Organic Farming Associationâ€™s third potluck in the Metro Boston area.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact Drew (drew@nofamass.org)

The potluck will be held in Cambridge. Email me (drew@nofamass.org) for the street address.
item.name: Midsummer Night's Feast: Potluck for Urban Gardening Enthusiasts
